channel.title: [PI] Fight Pits Rewards
channel.description:
Wondered how to do a few things in a PI source:
[ul][li][b]Award pest control points/currency as a reward to the winner of a fight pits match.[/b][/li] [li][b]Award pest control points/currency after completing a slayer task.[/b][/li][/ul]
[hr] I've ran through the pestcontrol class and found the function referring to a reward that's given at the end of a round to the winner, but no item id is displayed, even though barrows gloves are given. I figured then that the reward is maybe handled in the plaver class or under cases, or otherwise. But I don't want to spend hours rooting through files when someone here might possibly know. [hr] If anyone could help me out I'd greatly appreciate it, and would gladly offer rep++. And as far as the slayer rewards are concerned I'm just posting that in case it's common knowledge and could easily be explained, and if not I'll just look that one up in the snippets section. Only reason I ask about this is because on this forum, "the other forum", and "the other other forum" I couldn't find a snippet or tutorial on it.
Thank you in advance.

item.title: [PI] Fight Pits Rewards
item.dc:creator: @morningstar113 morningstar113
item.description:
@morningstar113 wrote:

Wondered how to do a few things in a PI source:

[ul][li]Award pest control points/currency as a reward to the winner of a fight pits match.[/li]
[li]Award pest control points/currency after completing a slayer task.[/li][/ul]

[hr]
I’ve ran through the pestcontrol class and found the function referring to a reward that’s given at the end of a round to the winner, but no item id is displayed, even though barrows gloves are given. I figured then that the reward is maybe handled in the plaver class or under cases, or otherwise. But I don’t want to spend hours rooting through files when someone here might possibly know.
[hr]
If anyone could help me out I’d greatly appreciate it, and would gladly offer rep++. And as far as the slayer rewards are concerned I’m just posting that in case it’s common knowledge and could easily be explained, and if not I’ll just look that one up in the snippets section. Only reason I ask about this is because on this forum, “the other forum”, and “the other other forum” I couldn’t find a snippet or tutorial on it.

Thank you in advance.
